item.title: Amanda add a quote by Hellen Keller
item.description: "The unselfish effort to bring cheer to others will be the beginning of a happier life for ourselves." -- Hellen Keller

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "He who receives an idea from me, receives instruction himself without lessening mine; as he who lights his taper at mine, receives light without darkening me." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "How many a man has dated a new era in his life from the reading of a book." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Amanda add a quote by George Eliot
item.description: "What do we live for, if it is not to make life less difficult for each other?" -- George Eliot

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Fred Rogers
item.description: "Love isn't a state of perfect caring. It is an active noun like struggle. To love someone is to strive to accept that person exactly the way he or she is, right here and now." -- Fred Rogers

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Deepak Chopra
item.description: "Nothing brings down walls as surely as acceptance." -- Deepak Chopra

item.title: Amanda add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "Whenever you feel like criticizing any one...just remember that all the people in this world haven't had the advantages that you've had." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "I am a part of everything that I have read." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Black Elk
item.description: "Know the Power that is Peace." -- Black Elk

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Cecil Frances Alexander
item.description: "All things bright and beautiful, All creatures great and small, All things wise and wonderful, The Lord God made them all." -- Cecil Frances Alexander

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Adam Rubin
item.description: "SECRET PIZZA PARTY! Oops, I said that kind of loud. Sorry, pizza smell gives me the happy screams." -- Adam Rubin

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Marthe Troly-Curtin
item.description: "Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time." -- Marthe Troly-Curtin
